name: Testportal
description: Testportal is an online platform for creating and managing assessments, quizzes, and exams for education and business.
longDescription: Testportal is an innovative online assessment platform designed to streamline the creation, delivery, and analysis of tests, quizzes, and exams for educational institutions and businesses. Its mission is to empower organizations to evaluate skills and knowledge efficiently, saving time and enhancing decision-making through advanced analytics. The platform supports both remote and on-site assessments, offering tools to automate question generation, grading, and result analysis. By integrating with Microsoft Teams and leveraging AI for question creation, Testportal simplifies the assessment process while ensuring reliability and security. It serves a global user base, including schools, universities, and companies like DHL and RSM Poland, by providing a user-friendly interface and robust data insights. Testportal also emphasizes eco-friendly online testing to reduce paper usage.
features: AI-powered question generation creates customized questions from provided materials in seconds, saving time for test creators.
Automated grading instantly evaluates responses, reducing manual effort and enabling quick result delivery.
Advanced analytics provide detailed insights into respondent performance, aiding data-driven decisions.
Integration with Microsoft Teams enables seamless test creation and management within a familiar collaboration tool.
Real-time monitoring allows administrators to track test progress and respondent scores during assessments.
Customizable test settings offer control over access, timing, and question formats to suit specific needs.
Secure data handling ensures respondent information and results are protected with high-quality security measures.
Examus proctoring integration enhances test integrity by preventing cheating during remote assessments.
Question database upload simplifies test creation by allowing bulk import of pre-existing questions.
Eco-friendly online assessments reduce paper usage, supporting sustainable practices for organizations.
